question: Can you tell me the meaning of this dream?
answer:
QUESTION
When i got in jamaat every month, every night i get a dream about marriage. I dream that i am with my wife, although i can not make out her face in my dreams. can you tell me what this means, and i why i have these dreams? i am only 15 years old, and not even close to the age when i could marry.
ANSWER


Share:
The dreams are the whispers of Shaytaan. You should recite, 'Laa Hawla Walaa
Quwwata Illaa Billaah' and ignore the dream.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
FATWA DEPT.
